episodes.synopsis: When Cylons surprise the fleet with an attack on the school ship, Adama orders Dillon and Troy to make an emergency landing on earth with the remaining children. Will they escape the Cylon onslaught in time?
episodes.title: The Super Scouts (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: As the children attempt to blend into society on earth, after escaping a Cylon attack on the fleet, they try to stop a chemical company from illegally dumping its toxic waste in a small town's water source.
episodes.title: The Super Scouts (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: As the children from the fleet continue assimilating into earth's culture, they discover that their special abilities give them surprising results at a baseball camp for needy children. Meanwhile, Dillon and Troy thwart the devious plans of Xavier.
episodes.title: Spaceball

episodes.synopsis: When a Cylon raider is shot down over earth, Dillon and Troy are shocked to discover that the Cylons have also developed a new, humanoid-looking model, but the pair's task of hunting down the surviving crew is complicated by Halloween.
episodes.title: The Night the Cylons Landed (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Dillon and Troy continue to hunt the humanoid Cylon, eventually tracking him to a radio station. Can they stop him before he makes contact with his base star? Or will he send a signal and spark another wave of Cylon attacks?
episodes.title: The Night the Cylons Landed (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: When Cylons destroy the fleet's ability to produce food, Troy, Dillon and the children on earth team up with a farmer to provide food for Galactica and the other ships. In turn, the farmer finds his way out of financial trouble.
episodes.title: Space Croppers

episodes.synopsis: In a dream he later reveals to Adama, Dr. Zee sees that Starbuck has crash-landed on a planet where he has made friends with a Cylon centurion and where a strange alien mysteriously gives birth to a baby boy.
episodes.title: The Return of Starbuck

video.title: Galactica 1980
video.synopsis: The inhabitants of the renegade star fleet take action when they realize earthlings aren't advanced enough to help battle the Cyclons.
